statements: SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT review, rating, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id = 10;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, review FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, rating FROM customer_feedback;
SELECT * FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating > 4 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, review FROM customer_feedback WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT review, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE product_id = 500 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_id, product_id, timestamp FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating < 3 AND customer_id = 200 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, review, rating FROM customer_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 102;
SELECT rating, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM product_review ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_id, feedback_text FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 10;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE rating < 2 ORDER BY rating ASC;
SELECT product_id, review_text, review_date FROM product_review WHERE review_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT id, customer_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM feedback WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM customer ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT product_id, product_name, category FROM product WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT feedback_id, rating, customer_id FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer.name, feedback.feedback_text, product.product_name FROM customer JOIN feedback ON customer.customer_id = feedback.customer_id JOIN product ON feedback.rating = product.product_id;
SELECT feedback.feedback_text, feedback.rating, customer.name FROM feedback JOIN customer ON feedback.customer_id = customer.customer_id WHERE feedback.rating <= 2;
SELECT customer.name, customer.email, COUNT(*) AS total_feedback FROM customer JOIN feedback ON customer.customer_id = feedback.customer_id GROUP BY customer.customer_id HAVING total_feedback >= 2;

SELECT customer.name, feedback.feedback_text, product.category FROM customer LEFT JOIN feedback ON customer.customer_id = feedback.customer_id LEFT JOIN product ON feedback.product_id = product.product_id WHERE feedback.rating IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM CustomerData;
SELECT review_text, rating, product_id FROM ProductReviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating < 3;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, analysis_results FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE analysis_results IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT feedback_text, rating, customer_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 4.5;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM CustomerData WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT DISTINCT product_id, AVG(rating) AS avg_rating FROM ProductReviews GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY avg_rating DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, feedback_id, analysis_results FROM FeedbackAnalysis WHERE feedback_id IN (SELECT feedback_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating < 3);
SELECT * FROM feedback;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id = 3;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews WHERE customer_id = 2 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT response_text FROM responses WHERE review_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT product_name, description FROM products WHERE product_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM feedback JOIN reviews ON feedback.customer_id = reviews.customer_id;
